item.description:
I am pleased to announce the Boston Photo, Photo Book, Ephemera, Civil War and Asian Art Show at the Hynes Convention Center 900 Boylston Street, Boston, MA on Saturday, November 12. http://www.usphotoshows.com/ You will meet the most varied dealer specialists in the photo community. The shows will feature dealers who specialize in the sale of daguerreotypes, ambrotypes, tintypes, CDVs, CC, vernacular images, stereoviews, snapshots, photos by well known photographers, images by up and coming photographers and book dealers. You will be exposed to rare museum quality images. What a great opportunity to view and purchase images from $1- 10,000 and up. Oh my, What fun!!   The ABAA Book (http://www.bostonbookfair.com/) show is held at the Hynes Convention Center on November 12 as well... and there will be a Black Memorabilia Show in a space on the 3rd floor.  
For those of you who are unfamiliar with the Hynes Center it is at the center of all that happens in Boston. Hope you will decide to join us.

 

Early Admission 8 AM - 10 AM $25.
General Admission 10 AM - 4 PM $10 ( with discount card $9 )
Student & Teacher Admission Noon - 4PM $5


LOCATION:
JOHN B. HYNES VETERANS MEMORIAL CONVENTION CENTER
900 Boylston Street, Boston, Massachusetts 02115
USA

Website: http://www.massconvention.com
Tel: 617-954-2000
Fax: 617-954-2125

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Boston Photo Show
